Posts.Content: Hi everyone i have been guided to this group i only joined tonight im so scared 18 months ago i had a lump a biospy was clear no further problems, last couple weeks i have had diffeculty swallowing, aching pain on an off in back left by shoulder pain, 7 days ago i found another lump in r breast. Checked lump today and its grown quite a bit in the last week,since seeing my gp.  Gp arranged urgent blood test 1 has come back sugar is normal but others havent. Now i know i may be worrying for nothing but go arranged for urgent referal to breast clinic which is this thursday 13th, i had a call from gp asking if i had my appointment date yet, im so scared they are holding somthing back why arnt my other blood test back and why would they call me asking if my appointment is through. Do you think they know something but are not saying. Also with my symptoms im so paranoid its not just breast cancer but secondary in my lungs too. Like a fool i googled and have scared myself to death.has anyone else had aame syptoms i know we all different but anything may help my state of mind at minute.im keeping how im feeling to myself as i dont want to worry my husband and nobe of my family know. Please help and sorry for long post
Posts.Title: Breast cancer scare

Posts.Content: Hi thanks for your reply, No when i had my biospy they said everything wasfine nofollow up ect. So now it is a case of waiting for thursday then if they do a biopsy waiting again last time it was the lingest 2 weeks of my life, i couldnt funtion hopefully this time will be different x
Posts.Title: Breast cancer scare
